document_data.name: ''Scimitar of the Defender''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Scimitars of the defender''''' were somewhat common [[enchanted]] [[scimitar]]s.
document_data.Description: These scimitars were bigger than an average weapon of the type or a [[saber]]. They had a curved shape with the outer side sharpened to deal slashing damage. It also had a proposed defensive hilt ending in an elongated sharp point.
document_data.Powers: Each ''scimitar of the defender'' had its slashing edge sharpened with a ''+1'' enchantment, and its magics allowed the wielder to improve their defenses through magical deflection of attacks. Stronger versions of these weapons existed.
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Ondabo]], a [[djinni]] servant of the [[Church of Auril]] who guarded their ice palace temple in the {{YearlinkName|1312}}.
* [[Yquog]], a [[demon]] allied with the [[Legion of the Chimera]] that sought to destroy the [[Ten-Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]] in [[1312 DR]].
